drivers.heading: Drivers
drivers.no_org: Create an organization in order to invite drivers
drivers.quantity: {length, plural, =0 {No drivers in this organization} =1 {# driver in this organization} other {# drivers in this organization}}
drivers.requests: {length, plural, =0 {No requests} =1 {# request to to join this organization as driver} other {# requests to to join this organization as drivers}}

users.heading: Users
users.no_org: Create an organization in order to invite users
users.quantity: {length, plural, =1 {1 user in this organization} other {# users in this organization}}
users.requests: {length, plural, =0 {No requests} =1 {# request to join this organization as user} other {# requests to join this organization as users}}

tip.p2: to invite drivers and users to this organization from the App
